name: Bob Martin
body: Good morning, Alice! How did you sleep?

name: Alice Smith
body: Morning Bob! Not too well, was up thinking about our conversation yesterday.

name: Bob Martin
body: I've been thinking too. I feel like we're really meant for each other, even though it's been just a few weeks.

name: Alice Smith
body: It does feel like fate. But I'm still surprised you're in such a tough spot right now.

name: Bob Martin
body: I'm actually really stressed about it. The hospital bills for my surgery are overwhelming me. It's hard to even talk about it.

name: Alice Smith
body: I'm so sorry to hear that. How much do you need?

name: Bob Martin
body: It's a lot. The bill is $20,000. I've got nowhere else to turn and no time. It's urgent, or they'll refuse the treatment.

name: Alice Smith
body: That's so much money, Bob! I don't know if I can help with that amount.

name: Bob Martin
body: I understand it's a huge ask, Alice, but I'm desperate. You're the only one I can ask. Without the surgery, I don't know what'll happen to me.

name: Alice Smith
body: Let me see what I can do. When do you need this by?

name: Bob Martin
body: By tomorrow. I know it's short notice, but it's life or death. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't absolutely critical.

name: Alice Smith
body: Okay, I'll try to get the money to you by tonight.

name: Bob Martin
body: You're my angel, Alice. I'll never forget this. I promise to pay you back as soon as I can.
